synopsis.text: Mask ed in the allure of the future, the world has become obsessed with the 'Metal Fight' games, a thrilling spectacle of colossal robots battling for the coveted title of the World's Best Metal Fighter. Enter Kurenai Ken, a spirited dreamer, and his reluctant-turned-ardent ally, Saeba Shoko, who together pilot the formidable Red Baron, a Super Robot Fighter equipped with a groundbreaking feedback system. As they navigate the treacherous path to becoming champions, they must confront a myriad of rivals from all corners of the globe, including the enigmatic Kaizer, the fearsome Tetsumen Tou doctors, Tiger and ShinRon. However, their journey takes a dark turn when the nefarious organization, Iron Mask, attempts to transform Metal Fight competitors and their robots into weapons, targeting Shoko and the Red Baron. As Iron Mask deploys its forces to eliminate Ken and his robot, the stakes have never been higher in this exhilarating clash of metal and ambition.
